items.name: Syr Darya Eco-Park
items.short_description: A newly developed green oasis along the Syr Darya river, offering walking paths, picnic areas, and educational exhibits on local flora and fauna. Perfect for nature lovers and families.
items.address: Along the Syr Darya embankment, near Kamoli Khujandi Park

items.name: Khujand Contemporary Art Gallery
items.short_description: Showcasing modern Tajik and Central Asian art, this gallery features rotating exhibitions, workshops, and a vibrant space for artistic expression and cultural exchange.

items.name: Silk Road Gastropub & Lounge
items.short_description: A chic new spot combining traditional Tajik flavors with modern culinary techniques, offering craft beverages and live music in a sophisticated ambiance.

items.name: Kids' World Discovery Center
items.short_description: An interactive educational play zone for children up to 12 years old, featuring STEM exhibits, creative play areas, and supervised activities designed to spark curiosity.
items.address: Bobojon Gafurov Street 8, inside Khujand City Mall

items.name: Khujand Digital History Museum
items.short_description: Experience Khujand's rich history through immersive digital exhibits, virtual reality tours, and interactive displays, bringing ancient legends and modern developments to life.

items.name: Rooftop Cinema & Cafe 'Starlight'
items.short_description: Enjoy classic films and new releases under the stars with panoramic views of Khujand, complemented by a cozy cafe serving snacks and beverages. A unique evening experience.
items.address: Intersection of Lenin Street and Turgenev Street (top floor of Khujand Plaza)

items.name: The Grand Bazaar Food Court & Artisan Market
items.short_description: An expansion of the famous Panjshanbe Bazaar, this new section offers a modern food court with diverse culinary options and a dedicated market for local artisans and handicrafts.
items.address: Near Panjshanbe Bazaar entrance, S. Sherozi Street

items.name: Khujand Botanical Garden Annex (Medicinal Plants)
items.short_description: An extension of the main botanical garden, this specialized annex focuses on the cultivation and study of medicinal plants native to Central Asia, offering guided tours and educational programs.
items.address: Firdavsi Street 15 (adjacent to main Botanical Garden)

items.name: Synergy VR Gaming Arena
items.short_description: Step into virtual worlds at Khujand's newest VR gaming center. Offering a wide range of immersive experiences from action-packed adventures to puzzle-solving challenges for all ages.

items.name: Khujand Waterfront Promenade & Amphitheater
items.short_description: A beautifully redesigned section of the Syr Darya embankment, featuring wide walking paths, scenic seating areas, and a new open-air amphitheater for concerts and cultural events.
items.address: Northern bank of Syr Darya, between Pushkin Park and Victory Park
